Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.verb

Class MailVerb

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.verb.Verb
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.verb.MailVerb
public class MailVerb extends Verb
MAIL verb.

This is used for parsing MAIL and RCPT commands.

See Also:
  • RFC 1870
  • RFC 3030
  • RFC 3461
  • RFC 6152
